name: Redwoods Media
tag_list: flash-demos, software-demos, consumer-education, educational-demonstration, screencast, promotional-showcase, product-demos, website-demos, video-demos, training-demos, software-demonstrations, website-demonstrations, video-demonstrations, flash-demonstra
overview:
Redwoods Media is a leading provider of high quality video demonstrations for businesses both large and small. They provide two types of video demonstrations. Promotional Demonstrations, which are ideal for showcasing and promoting a product, and Educational Demonstrations, which provide training for customers or employees on how to use a product.

They use a 3 step proccess to build the demonstrations. First, a team of script writers will research a product and work with marketing professionals to craft a script. Next, the script will be read and recorded by a professional voice artist. Finally, RWM will capture video of the product and combine it with the voiceover to produce a high quality video demonstration. These 3 steps require require two weeks for completion.
